settings.caption: Decor
settings.heading: MATA DURGA IDOL
settings.text: Illuminate your surroundings with the radiant energy of Mata Durga. Shop our desk idol today and invite the blessings of the goddess into your life and work.

settings.caption: Decor
settings.heading: GALAXY CRYSTAL BALL
settings.text: Each crystal ball is meticulously crafted to capture the awe-inspiring colors and patterns of the cosmos, making it a stunning addition to any space. Whether displayed on your desk, bookshelf, or meditation altar, the Galaxy Crystal Ball adds a touch of celestial elegance to any environment.

settings.caption: Decor
settings.heading: LORD BUDDHA STATUE
settings.text: Immerse yourself in a realm of tranquility and wisdom with our exquisite Lord Buddha statue. Crafted with reverence and attention to detail, this timeless piece serves as a beacon of serenity and enlightenment, inviting you to cultivate inner peace and spiritual awakening.
